mapper.select: select a.aplPk, cl.clntNm, a.trPlace, a.covCode, cv.covNm, a.clntCnt, p.premium, a.aplCdt, a.aplStateCode, cd.codeNm as aplState, p.payedYN, a.useYN from simgotidb.application a inner join simgotidb.client cl on a.clntPk = cl.clntPk inner join simgotidb.payment p on a.payPk = p.payPk inner join simgotidb.code cd on a.aplStateCode = cd.codePk inner join simgotidb.coverage cv on a.covCode = cv.covCode where a.aplPk = #{aplPk} and cd.useYN = 'Y'
mapper.update:
update simgotidb.application set aplStateCode = #{aplStateCode}, aplUdt = now()
,useYN = 'Y'
,useYN = 'N'
where aplPk = #{aplPk}
